AUTHOR: Zephyrkul
INSTALL_MSG:
`[p]nation` and `[p]region`. Quotes are *not* needed for the argument.
If this is your first install, use `[p]agent` before continuing.
NAME: NationStates
SHORT: Gets general information about a nation or region
DESCRIPTION: Gets information about a nation or region, pretties it up, and embeds the result
